{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = Medic | class = Medic | game = Strife | doomednum = 74 | convid = 5 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Merchant|Merchant]]→Medic
A man of medicine. The medic is mostly inherited from the [[Classes:Merchant|Merchant]] class. Selling medical supplies to people who tend to get shot an awful lot is what he does. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Medic : {{Class|Merchant}} { {{Property|Translation}} 6 {{Property|PainSound}} "medic/pain" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_MEDIC" // "Medic" }
